__construct ( $  config  )

Definition at line 161 of file Controller.php.

emailException ( $  e  ) 

Default callback for emailing runtime exceptions.

Override this method in a subclass of ASO_Controller to change the default behavior.

Parameters:
Exception $e The exception that was thrown at runtime

Definition at line 268 of file Controller.php.

logException ( $  e  ) 

Default callback for logging runtime exceptions.

Override this method in a subclass of ASO_Controller to log this error to someplace other than var/log/exceptions.log.

Parameters:
Exception $e The exception that was thrown at runtime
